title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Teaching your AI tools custom languages and libraries (DVT341)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 教授你的 AI 工具自定义语言和库 (DVT341)
abstract: Enterprises often develop custom libraries, tools, and domain-specific languages to power their operations. Integrating these proprietary assets within your AI tools can be a challenge. In this talk, I will share how to use Kiro, an agentic AI tool, to understand and work with custom libraries. I'll demonstrate the power of combining steering files and Model Context Protocol to teach Kiro new skills, establish best practices, and keep its knowledge up-to-date. Attendees will learn a repeatable approach to empower their AI tools to seamlessly work with the specialized services that drive their business
abstract_cn: 企业通常会开发自定义库、工具和领域特定语言来支持其运营。将这些专有资产集成到您的AI工具中可能是一个挑战。在本次演讲中，我将分享如何使用Kiro这一智能体AI工具来理解和使用自定义库。我将演示如何结合引导文件和模型上下文协议来教会Kiro新技能、建立最佳实践并保持其知识的更新。与会者将学习一种可重复的方法，使他们的AI工具能够无缝地使用驱动其业务的专业化服务。
